result.eng: The office is on the first floor.
result.ga: tá an oifig ar an chéad urlár
result.orig: tá an oifig ar an chéad urlár
result.html: tá an oifig ar an chéad urlárThe office is on the first floor.
result.ponchtml: tá an oifig ar an ċéad urlárThe office is on the first floor.

result.eng: Put it down on the floor.
result.ga: cuir síos ar an urlár é
result.orig: cuir síos ar an urlár é
result.html: cuir síos ar an urlár éPut it down on the floor.
result.ponchtml: cuir síos ar an urlár éPut it down on the floor.

result.eng: I found him lying on the floor.
result.ga: fuair mé é agus é ina luí ar an urlár
result.orig: fuair mé é agus é ina luí ar an urlár
result.html: fuair mé é agus é ina luí ar an urlárI found him lying on the floor.
result.ponchtml: fuair mé é agus é ina luí ar an urlárI found him lying on the floor.

result.html: ná luigh ar an urlárDon't lie on the floor.
result.ponchtml: ná luiġ ar an urlárDon't lie on the floor.

result.eng: Pick it up from the floor.
result.ga: pioc aníos ón urlár é
result.orig: pioc aníos ón urlár é
result.html: pioc aníos ón urlár éPick it up from the floor.
result.ponchtml: pioc aníos ón urlár éPick it up from the floor.

result.eng: We are on the second floor.
result.ga: tá muid ar an dara hurlár
result.orig: tá muid ar an dara hurlár
result.html: tá muid ar an dara hurlárWe are on the second floor.
result.ponchtml: tá muid ar an dara hurlárWe are on the second floor.

result.eng: One night he felt he was choking and fell in a heap on the floor.
result.ga: oíche amháin mhothaigh sé go raibh sé á thachtadh agus thit sé ina chnap ar an urlár
result.orig: oíche amháin mhothaigh sé go raibh sé á thachtadh agus thit sé ina chnap ar an urlár
result.html: oíche amháin mhothaigh sé go raibh sé á thachtadh agus thit sé ina chnap ar an urlárOne night he felt he was choking and fell in a heap on the floor.
result.ponchtml: oíċe aṁáin ṁoṫaiġ sé go raiḃ sé á ṫaċtaḋ agus ṫit sé ina ċnap ar an urlárOne night he felt he was choking and fell in a heap on the floor.

result.eng: He put them upside down in the middle of the floor.
result.ga: bhuail sé a mbéal fúthu i lár an urláir iad
result.orig: bhuail sé a mbéal fúthu i lár an urláir iad
result.html: bhuail sé a mbéal fúthu i lár an urláir iadHe put them upside down in the middle of the floor.
result.ponchtml: ḃuail sé a mbéal fúṫu i lár an urláir iadHe put them upside down in the middle of the floor.

result.eng: The horse was scratching his foot on the floor.
result.ga: bhí an capall ag tochas a chos ar an urlár
result.orig: bhí an capall ag tochas a chos ar an urlár
result.html: bhí an capall ag tochas a chos ar an urlárThe horse was scratching his foot on the floor.
result.ponchtml: ḃí an capall ag toċas a ċos ar an urlárThe horse was scratching his foot on the floor.
